CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . MOT holds CHI in her arms then puts her down on the floor . INV instructs MOT about the warm-up activity procedure while CHI crawls around on the floor . MOT sits in the chair near the door
CHI turns to watch INV leave then looks at MOT
boo_boo is a pet name MOT uses for CHI
CHI looks down at the toys
CHI picks up a toy from the floor and rocks back and forth
CHI has her back to the camera
MOT speaks in a soft high voice
CHI picks up the toy duck
CHI looks down at the toy duck
a phone rings somewhere out of camera view
CHI lowers duck to lap level and squeezes it
CHI points to the jack+in+the+box then looks at MOT
MOT looks over at the jack+in+the+box then to CHI
CHI crawls over to the jack+in+the+box
CHI still reaches for the jack+in+the+box
CHI holds the clown and looks at it closely
man's voice is heard in the background
CHI gets up on her knees letting go of the jack+in+the+box head
CHI touches the head of the jack+in+the+box
<bef> MOT laughs . MOT smiles at CHI
CHI holds her arms out and turns to look at MOT
CHI lets go of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the lid of the jack+in+the+box down briefly
CHI throws her arms up briefly and looks up at MOT
CHI looks back at the jack+in+the+box then shakes her head vigorously
CHI looks over her shoulder at the toy duck then turns back towards the jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up the football from the floor in front of her
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT then turns attention back to the ball
CHI puts football to her mouth
CHI turns to MOT still holding the football up by her mouth
CHI throws the ball on the floor
the ball rolls to the corner of the room
CHI looks at MOT and points at the ball
looks at CHI and widens her eyes
MOT gets down on floor and grabs the football
MOT tosses the ball at CHI and it rolls away again
CHI back is still to the camera
MOT grabs a cloth that CHI was sitting on and wipes CHI's nose
CHI picks up the football and tosses it
MOT bends over on the floor
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box down in its box and closed the lid
MOT sits back and folds her hands on her lap
CHI touches the closed lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT leans forward and slowly lifts the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches over and pushes the clown down then tries to close the cover
MOT leans forward and pushes the clown down
CHI holds her hand on the lid then looks around the room
<bef> CHI puts her hand on a book on the floor
CHI looks up at MOT over her shoulder
CHI looks down at the book
CHI sits back and looks at the book briefly
<aft> CHI tries to pick up the book
CHI picks up the book loses her grip then picks it up again and slides it close to her lap
CHI looks up at MOT and holds the book
CHI lifts up the book and pulls it in front of her
CHI struggles to stand up while still holding the book in one hand then stands facing MOT and holds up the book
MOT takes the book from CHI
MOT looks down at the book and watches CHI
MOT sits on her side and puts her arm around CHI waist
MOT places the book at her side then pulls CHI onto her lap and kisses her forehead
CHI looks down at the book
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
CHI puts her hand on the book cover
MOT looks at CHI then back at the book
CHI points at something on the page
MOT looks at where CHI pointed then at the other page
CHI looks at the other page
<aft> CHI begins to scratch the side of her head
MOT speaks in a high pitched whisper
MOT puts her hand where CHI keeps touching her head
CHI leans over and looks at something in the corner of the room and holds her hand to her head
MOT leans close to watch CHI
CHI rolls off of MOT lap onto all fours landing next to jack+in+the+box
MOT eases CHI onto floor with one arm while putting the open book down at her side
MOT looks at CHI then at the book
CHI kneels next to jack+in+the+box and puts both her hands on the closed lid
MOT flips through pages of the book which is on the floor
CHI turns and looks up at MOT still holding her hand on the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns and looks down at the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI tries to open the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts the book down off to the side
CHI tries to open the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT leans over and begins to open jack+in+the+box
MOT leans down and looks closely at CHI
CHI lifts the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI pulls down the head of the clown and then tries to close the lid
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT
CHI holds the jack+in+the+box up off the floor putting one hand on the lid and the other on the clown
CHI tries to pull the clown out of the box
CHI looks down at the hand of the clown
MOT looks to her side then at CHI
CHI looks at MOT over her shoulder
CHI holds up jack+in+the+box by the lid
MOT picks the clown up by the head and pulls it closer to her
CHI pulls the jack+in+the+box away from MOT and holds it up in the air
CHI puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor and flips the lid
MOT leans forward and closes the lid of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up at MOT and holds her hand on the lid
MOT points at the jack+in+the+box latch then sits back
CHI tries to get the lid open
MOT reaches forward and undoes the latch
<bef> CHI grabs the head of the jack+in+the+box and holds it back
<bef> CHI looks at the clown . CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI gets up on her knees and looks into the wastebasket
CHI stands up grasping the wastebasket
CHI looks at MOT and points at wastebasket
CHI looks into wastebasket holding the edge of it
CHI lifts up the bag on the waste basket
<bef> CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI bends down and grabs the head of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT
CHI looks down into the waste basket
CHI leans and points her finger into the electric socket
<bef> CHI looks at MOT . CHI points up at some pictures hanging on the wall
MOT looks up at the pictures then at CHI
CHI looks at MOT over her shoulder
<aft> CHI loses her balance and totters for an instant
MOT looks up at the pictures
CHI points up at the picture directly with both hands
picture is out of camera view
<bef> CHI lowers her arms and puts them on her hips briefly
CHI looks up at the paintings
CHI points at a picture that is lower on the wall
MOT looks over at the picture to which CHI is pointing
<bef> CHI walks over to a picture that is lower on the wall
CHI points to the picture and looks at MOT
MOT looks at the picture and nods
CHI looks up at the painting
MOT looks over at the painting
CHI points to the picture higher up on the wall then looks over her shoulder at MOT
CHI looks back up at the Mickey Mouse picture and points to it
CHI totters over to the wastebasket almost tripping over the door stop
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT
CHI grasps the edge of the wastebasket
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT
MOT draws back sticking out her tongue
CHI looks at MOT over her shoulder
MOT gets up and leans toward the wastebasket . <aft> MOT stands up
MOT picks up the cloth with which she wiped CHI nose from the chair
INV enters room and explains Small Scale Activity to MOT
INV clears the toys from Warm-up and gives more instructions to MOT
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place

INV enters room and explains Forbidden Object Activity and to MOT and has her sit in the small chair next to CHI . INV clears away the toys from Small Scale Activity and gives CHI the necklace to hold
CHI grasps the beaded necklace between her hands
INV reaches into a desk drawer and pulls out the Forbidden Object
CHI turns to look at the drawer then turns back to look at her necklace
MOT looks at INV then at object
INV places the forbidden object on the table in front of CHI
INV sets the object in motion
CHI looks up at the object
CHI reaches up for the object
MOT pushes CHI hand away from the object gently
CHI holds hand close to object
MOT pulls CHI's hand away from object
CHI holds her hand suspended near the object
<$=1> MOT pushes CHI hand away from object
CHI keeps hands lowered but leans towards the object
CHI begins to raise her hand to object
CHI holds her hand suspended near the object
CHI glances down at the beads on the desk
CHI reaches up at the object
CHI looks up at INV and reaches for the object
CHI points to the ball on the end of the object
CHI holds her hand up to the object
CHI moves her arm back from MOT
CHI puts the beads up on the table
CHI points at one ball . <aft> CHI looks down at the beads that she holds in her hands
<$=1> MOT rests her head on her hand
CHI tosses the beads onto the table then lifts them up to MOT
INV takes the forbidden object off the table
INV tells MOT about four PCI activities . while INV speaks CHI walks over to the mirrors on the side of the room and babbles as she stares up at them
MOT kneels on the floor in front of CHI
CHI has her back to the camera
MOT sits back and holds the ball out to CHI
MOT hands the ball to CHI
CHI drops the ball onto the floor
CHI watches the ball drop onto the floor
MOT picks the ball up off the floor . <aft> MOT rolls the ball to CHI
MOT recovers the ball and throws it in the air
CHI turns and points up at the mirrored walls
CHI makes a growling throaty noise
CHI still looks up at the mirrors
<aft> MOT imitates CHI growling noises then makes a kissing noise
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
CHI turns to other wall and points at the pictures hanging there
CHI points up at the wall
MOT looks up at the picture then at CHI
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
<aft> MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI watches the ball for an instant then points across the room at the big chair
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
CHI grabs the ball as she walks over to the big chair on the other side of the room
MOT watches CHI cross the room
CHI watches the ball roll to the corner of the room
<$=1> MOT reaches back and retrieves the ball
<aft> MOT holds the ball up to CHI
MOT holds the ball up to CHI
CHI walks to the chair and grabs the arms
CHI tosses the cloth on the chair onto the floor and reaches for MOT's purse
CHI looks at MOT and then turns back towards the chair
MOT walks over to the desk
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT as she continues to reach for the purse
MOT grabs the purse off the chair and puts it on the desk
MOT puts the ball in the box
CHI bounces up and down as she holds on the arms of the chair
MOT opens a box on the desk and takes something out
CHI looks at MOT and reaches up
MOT walks over to the center of the room unfolding the towel
CHI walks to the center of the room
MOT kneels on the floor and holds the towel up
CHI turns to look at MOT
CHI's back is to the camera
CHI stands with back to camera staring at MOT
MOT drops the towel revealing her face
CHI takes hesitating steps toward MOT
MOT holds the towel out to CHI
CHI turns away from MOT toward the mirrors and points up at the mirrors . <aft> CHI looks at MOT
MOT looks up at the mirrors then at CHI
CHI points up at the pictures on the wall with both hands
MOT glances quickly up at the wall and then looks at CHI
CHI waves arms up and down excitedly and takes a few steps forward
CHI looks up at the pictures on the wall
MOT moves toward CHI on her knees
CHI points at a wall socket and then looks at MOT
CHI turns toward the corner with the socket
MOT holds the towel up in back of CHI
CHI turns to face towel that hangs from her head to toe
CHI walks over to the little chair and leans on it with both hands
MOT holds the towel up in front of herself then lets it drop
CHI looks up at the mirrors
CHI starts to climb up on the chair putting her leg up on it
MOT leans forward and grabs the chair
MOT pulls the chair out from the wall and to the left
MOT lets go of the chair
CHI takes her leg down off the chair then rocks the chair forward once briefly
CHI looks up at the mirrors
CHI turns and looks at MOT over her shoulder
CHI tries to get up on the chair
MOT grabs the back of CHI legs and tries unsuccessfully to push her up onto the chair
CHI gets down off the chair after getting about halfway up
CHI looks up at the mirrors
MOT stops pushing CHI legs and grabs the towel on her lap
CHI looks over her shoulder toward MOT
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
CHI points in direction of MOT
MOT leans forward and helps CHI onto the chair
CHI looks up at the mirrors
<$=1> MOT lifts CHI up to standing position in front of mirrors
MOT supports CHI by holding under her arms
CHI stamps her feet lightly on the small chair seat
CHI points at something in the mirror
MOT looks into the mirror with CHI
CHI points to something else in the mirror
MOT leans her head to the side and looks where CHI pointed
CHI points at mirror glances off to the side and then looks back at the mirror
CHI looks in the mirror briefly then looks down at her feet
CHI looks down at the chair
CHI looks down at the chair
CHI stamps her foot once on the seat of the chair
< .1u-1u> MOT turns CHI to face away from the mirror and sits her down in the chair
MOT picks up the towel again
MOT moves the towel closer to CHI face
CHI moves head forward to meet the towel
MOT drapes the towel over CHI's head
<aft> MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
MOT leans forward and watches CHI
CHI kicks her leg a few times then pulls the towel off
CHI looks down at her lap
MOT holds her face close to CHI
CHI holds her arm out toward MOT with the towel draped over it
the towel falls off of CHI's arm
CHI looks up at the mirrors
MOT picks up the towel and stands up then moves over to the desk
CHI turns back and watches MOT at the desk but points toward the mirrors
MOT is out of camera view
CHI sits in the chair and watches MOT
MOT picks up the next box and shows it to CHI
CHI gets down off the chair
CHI reaches out for the box
MOT brings a box of crayons and papers down to the floor and sits in front of CHI
CHI squats down and touches the crayons that are inside the box
MOT sits back on her knees and folds her hands on her lap
CHI examines the crayon in her hand then looks down at the paper
MOT lifts a piece of paper out of the box
CHI looks into the box as she squats in front of it
CHI grabs a bunch of papers and stands up dropping most of them to the floor
CHI glances down at the paper on the floor then stands facing MOT holding up one paper and two crayons
CHI squats down placing the paper on the floor and takes a crayon in each hand then begins to draw on the paper
CHI turns and braces herself on the small chair in order to stand up
MOT reaches over picking up a crayon and a paper then moves over to the small chair on her knees
<$=1> MOT puts the paper down on the seat of the small chair
MOT leans over CHI and puts two crayon on top of the paper
CHI gains her balance and stands in front of the chair looking down at the paper
MOT leans over CHI's head and holds up a crayon
CHI looks down at the paper and stretches both arms up in the air
<aft> MOT sits back on her knees
CHI picks up the other crayon
CHI examines the crayons in her hands closely
CHI drops a crayon onto the paper
MOT starts gathering the scattered papers from the floor then puts them in the box
<bef> CHI picks all three crayons up off the paper
CHI looks at MOT over her shoulder
MOT moves over next to CHI
CHI bends over and drops the crayons
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT lifts the box up to CHI then puts it down again
CHI stares at MOT crayon and reaches for it
MOT picks up a crayon and hands it to CHI
CHI takes both crayons from MOT hands then begins to draw
<$=2> MOT holds the paper for CHI
MOT leans close to CHI and speaks into her face
CHI gives her crayon to MOT
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
CHI turns to face the paper again
CHI stares down at the paper
CHI takes the paper off the seat and hands it to MOT
MOT looks at the paper and raises her eyebrows
MOT takes the paper from CHI
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI starts to climb back onto the chair to look into the mirrors
MOT puts the crayon and paper down at her side
CHI pauses and looks over her shoulder at MOT
MOT offers a crayon to CHI
CHI starts to climb onto the chair again
MOT puts the paper back onto the seat of the chair and begins to draw on it
CHI pauses and looks down at the paper
CHI still has one knee on the chair in an attempt to get up to see the mirrors
MOT puts down her paper and crayon
MOT helps CHI onto the chair
CHI points at something in the mirror
<$=1> MOT picks up the box and gets up
MOT pats the back of CHI's legs
MOT begins to walk over to the desk
CHI starts to rock backward as she kneels on the chair
<$=1> MOT puts her hand on CHI's back momentarily then reaches out and grabs CHI foot pulling it to get her off the chair
CHI resists MOT pulling by pulling her leg in the other direction
MOT pulls CHI's leg again then lets go and touches her shoulder
CHI looks off to her side
MOT walks over to the desk
CHI gets down off the chair
<aft> CHI turns and watches MOT at the desk
MOT is off camera and the noise of the rustling boxes is heard
<aft> MOT drops the box down in the middle of the floor and squats in front of it
<bef> CHI squats down in front of the box
CHI reaches out to the box lid and runs her hand along it
MOT lifts the lid of the box slightly to reveal the book
CHI looks down at the box
MOT holds the lid halfway open
CHI squats down and pulls the lid fully off
MOT puts the lid off on the floor
CHI looks down at the book in the box
CHI picks up the book and drops it into the box again
CHI picks up the book again and stands up straight
CHI looks down at the book
CHI holds the open book up and looks at it
CHI hands the book to MOT
MOT takes the book from CHI
CHI walks toward MOT with her arm extended towards MOT
MOT wraps her arm around CHI waist
MOT sits CHI down on her lap
MOT holds the book out in front of her and CHI
MOT points to a picture in the book
CHI turns her head and looks on the opposite page
MOT points to the opposite page
CHI looks at the other page
CHI holds her hand on the book and looks down at it
CHI points and looks up at the mirror
MOT points to a picture in the book and leans close to CHI's face
CHI looks back down at the book
CHI opens her mouth to speak but produces nothing
MOT moves her face farther from CHI
CHI points at a picture in the book
MOT bounces CHI up and down on her lap
CHI looks down at the book
<$=1> MOT leans closely into CHI face
CHI looks down at the book
MOT holds her face close to CHI
CHI opens to another page . <aft> closes the book
CHI looks at the page briefly
CHI gets up and walks over to the small chair then puts the book down on the seat and opens it
CHI flips through the pages of the book
CHI points at something in the book and turns to look at MOT
CHI looks at the book then glaces up at the mirrors
CHI points up to the mirrors
CHI drops the book onto the floor and begins to climb up on the chair again
CHI turns and looks at the book
MOT holds the book up for CHI to see
MOT moves the hologram on the front of the book
CHI takes the book from MOT hand and gets off the chair
CHI examines the edge of the book closely
CHI picks up the book and opens it upside down then puts the book down on the seat
CHI begins to flip through the pages
CHI closes the book then opens it
CHI looks down at the book
CHI drops the book and begins to climb onto the chair
CHI looks up at the mirrors
CHI tries to stand on the seat
MOT moves closer to the chair and puts her hand out in back of CHI
MOT holds CHI waist and helps her stand
CHI opens her arms as she looks in the mirror at herself
MOT holds onto CHI waist from the back
MOT kneels in back of CHI holding her waist while CHI stands on the chair
CHI points at the mirror with both hands
CHI bangs on the mirror with both hands
<3> CHI rests her hands on the mirror
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI in mirror
CHI looks off to the side
MOT points up to the mirror then looks at CHI
CHI looks over in direction to which MOT points
CHI leans closer to the mirror then backs away a bit
MOT watches CHI while still holding her waist
CHI points up at something in the corner of the room near the camera
MOT looks up in direction to which CHI points
CHI points to the mirror again
MOT now looks at the mirror
CHI looks up at the ceiling
CHI looks down at the chair
MOT looks at CHI in the mirror
MOT points at CHI in the mirror
CHI points repeatedly to her image in the mirror
CHI pauses pointing at the mirror and looking up at something in the mirror
MOT leans closer to CHI and looks up at the mirror also
MOT straightens up again so she kneels directly in back of CHI
CHI looks to the side and then down towards her feet
CHI looks down at her feet then up at the mirror
